name: Scargo
description: Nobody is sure whether the constant collision of the Scargo's clash cymbal-tipped eye-stalks causes it any discomfort, or if the Wublin has just gotten used to it. What is sure is that this Monster's technique is near-perfection - many new percussionists can't seem to get a handle on the proper grip. Then again, if the cymbals were attached to you, you might figure it out quicker than most, too.
breedingCombo: None. Zap The Contents, And Power Up!
polarity: Negative from: Maulch, Negative toward: Dermit, Positive from: Blipsqueak, Positive toward: Pixolotl
